title: Leona VS Diana: WHO WOULD WIN?
body:
#**UPDATE:  VOTING IS CLOSED!** I wish I could say it was a close race... but it's clear Diana is the victor here. EMBRACE THE HERESY!

Watch the fight video to see her winning ending revealed! And, for those who bask in the glory of the sun, we've gone ahead and added Leona's ending for you to check out too =)

Thanks for playing everyone!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m9SgYjaMphk

**More goodies:**

Check out [this interview](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-spotlight/designers-weigh-leona-vs-diana), in which a designer and artist involved in the champions' creation weigh in on who they think would win!

Plus, take a look at this awesome[ community art](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-spotlight/leona-vs-diana-community-art) depicting our favorite celestial aspects!

More Who Would Win:  [LUCIAN VS THRESH](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SRLHIkY5fB0)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------


This year brought us a whole lotta Targon. Along with more information about [the mountain itself](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/mount-targon/story.html) and [a new champion](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/mount-targon/aurelion-sol.html), we got some updated lore on old favorites -- including [Leona](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/mount-targon/leona.html) and [Diana](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/mount-targon/diana.html).

#And then we got thinking: **Who would win if these two decided to throw down?**

We teamed up with [Nevarky](https://www.youtube.com/user/nevarky) to imagine what a hypothetical fight between the Radiant Dawn and the Scorn of the Moon might look like.

#Notice the cliffhanger -- **you decide who wins!**

~~Check out the beginning of the fight and cast your vote in the poll below. Also, sound off in the comments and upvote your favorite bits of discussion! We’ll use it all in determining which champion snags victory.~~

~~The cutoff is 11:59 PM PDT Tuesday (June 21).~~

~~We’ll reveal the winner on Wednesday, so check back!~~

replies.body:
They would simply lay down their weapons and make out in the end.
Meaning everybody wins. :^)
So... what happens to the boards when our resident Leona and Diana see this thread?

I'll

So.... #TeamLeona or #TeamDiana?

#TeamPairing

<3

They're bound to understand each other sooner or later :v
I really had to resist putting an option in the poll that just said "OTP"

#TeamDiana

Leona is a support, Diana would just dumpster on her.
You clearly have not had to play against a full ap Leona then my friend. It hurts too much -_-
What you should really do for the next poll is "what's your favorite ship/pairing?" Then give a few popular ships and the option to put in a custom one. (my personal favorite is Tahm x Fizz ;))

and as they both fight pantheon does a full skyfall combo on them both at the same time, then aurelion sol comes in and goes boop and there's no more targons.

Leona and Diana Wins! They realize friendship's more important!

If you are talking about an actual fight, Diana would have the advantage even without powers and stuff, because the hooked blades that were made in real life were made to get around shields, and get into the folds in armor, that and she is wearing light armor which gives her more mobility then Leona's Cumbersome heavy armor{{champion:131}} ftw
You guys should really make one of those cinematic clips about this fight i'd totally enjoy that
{{champion:131}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:131}}

leona stuns diana, your team kills her. ggez
EDIT: To everybody telling me its a 1v1, find exactly where it says that. i just looked and saw no mention of he numbers on either side, meaning its up to how you interpret it

Diana would win but she will kill herself out of guilt because she killed the one person that made her whole.

After all the Moon cant exist without the Sun.
I'm a {{champion:89}}  main so I just picked favorites xD
Team Diana FTW!!!
Leona because tank meta
#TeamDiana

Well, well... Taking out the fact that I ship them, I guess Leona would win...

... Because her beaming would blind Diana ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Nah, but being serious, I think they would be pretty much equalized. I wouldn't find it crazy if it would end up in a draw and both being unable to defeat the other xD So... No vote from me, since I think either one could win.

Leona would be the only one that would win, the sun is the source of the light that the moon reflects, so if the sun dies, the moon would disappear to our naked eyes, so Diana wouldn't know where to harness her power from, so she would die, so it would be a tie,or leone could kill her, cause the sun can care less if the moon is around or not.
Diana *does* have a night-light on her for-head. It could act as a compass. ;p
Team Diana my doods <3

Depends on what you go by. If it's just by the light, then the Sun and Leona win because as Sol points out, they're the same source of light. However, if you go by terrestrial effects that the bodies have on the world, the sun brings light, supplies plants with their sustenance, and warmth for all life while the moon bring tides, it effects certain currents above and under the water (and thus, has play on the water cycles), and can affect certain geological activity. Both have near quintessential effects on the world and life on it, so they would be nose to nose in that regard.
DIANA FOR NIGHTS{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{champion:131}}
compare Diana to Leona, Diana more likely be able to oneshot{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
**TeamDiana**
